Downloaded and extracted fine, but when I try to run the eqgame shortcut it tells me d3dx9_30.dll is missing. Anyone else have this issue or know how to fix it?

That error typically means that you are missing the required Direct X9 runtime. You can get it at microsoft.com. And no, Direct x 11 is not backward compatible. I hope that helps...if you still have the same issue. If so, please share with others how you were able to resolve it.
